documents.document: Good morning #Canberra enjoy the cooler weather today! Rain with a top of 27 @abccanberra @abcnewsCanberra
Drug-driving charges climb in Canberra as drink-driving falls https://t.co/wJOF4s0HNA via @ABCNews
Good morning #Canberra you can look forward to a possible shower or two later today, top of 34 degrees @abccanberra
Making #Canberra news the new Chief Justice of High Court Susan Kiefel sworn-in, total fire ban in ACT and school's back! @abccanberra
For those wondering what a severe fire danger warning is: https://t.co/JnNtDENe8h #canberra
Good morning #Canberra a total fire ban for ACT region with a severe fire danger warning, a top of 39. Stay cool out there! @abccanberra
News @ 7 on @abccanberra 2 dead in a Perth plane crash, Mexican Pres cancels meeting with US Pres + recovering from the Tarago fire
Good morning #Canberra happy Friday! A partly cloudy day with a top of 33. A hot & sunny weekend ahead and then 39 on Monday #hothothot
#Canberra Theatre Centre deletes social media posts about Aust Day ad with 2 Muslim girls after violent threats. More at 12 @abccanberra
News @ 7 on @abccanberra British Parli needs to formalise Brexit + Barnaby Joyce suggests Sydney home buyers look to the bush #canberra
ACT could ease ban on ad billboards but @ABarrMLA says no suggestion to turn #canberra into Times Square @JamesFettes @abccanberra
Good morning #Canberra How stunning was the sunset last night? Cloud clearing to mostly sunny day, morning drizzle top of 29 @abccanberra
News @ 7 Trump withdraws from TPP, a Canberra man missing in Blue Mountains & last night's vigil for Bourke St victims @abccanberra
Good morning #Canberra love the sound of rain in the morning. Early showers, possible thunderstorm. Another hot day with a top of 35
News @ 7 @abccanberra Melbourne vigil for car rampage victims, ACT ranked 3rd eco in nation + Trump response to protests #canberra
Good morning #Canberra a mostly sunny morning, chance of showers and possible arvo thunderstorm, top of 35 @abccanberra
@SimonLoughridge @abcnewsCanberra I wish! Good pick-up
News @ 7 @abccanberra 3 dead & more missing in Italy avalanche, the race for NSW Premier + ACTGreens stand firm on greyhound racing ban
Good morning #Canberra welcome to Friday! Cloudy with rain clearing during the afternoon, a top of 28 @abccanberra
More brilliant photos last night from @ellinghausen #canberra https://t.co/Q3oriX1LhI
Sutton fire has been contained, fire near Tarago still out of control but cooler temperatures expected to help @abcnewsCanberra #Canberra
Good morning #Canberra did you enjoy the cool change overnight? It was almost cold outside this morning. A partly cloudy day, top of 28
Stay tuned to @abccanberra this afternoon for news updates on the #tarago fire from @JulianBAbbott + @jessedorsett
ABC's @jessedorsett will give an update on the #tarago #fire in the news at 9 @abccanberra
Tuning into @RNBreakfast to hear my former colleague @Simon_Cullen talking #brexit and Theresa May's speech
The #tarago #fire has grown substantially overnight to 3300 hectares & continues to burn out of control. One property damaged @abccanberra
The #tarago #fire continues to burn out of control. Conditions eased overnight with rain but crews face a hot, dry & windy day ahead
Good morning #Canberra the first total fire ban of the summer is in force today, top temp of 37. Keep across the latest on @abccanberra
Looking forward to more work from @ellinghausen at the Aust Open https://t.co/IML2D5GocH
Aust govt officials caught up in Yahoo cyber attack + more on firies accom row at #Canberra airport coming up on @abccanberra at 630
Emails of senior politicians compromised in Yahoo hack https://t.co/8DFFxhtJ93 via @ABCNews
Good morning #Canberra you're heading to a top of 37 degrees, stay cool out there. Tune into @abccanberra for the news at 6am
@russellmahoney thanks, you're too kind as always

@naomiwoodley thank you! Good to be back

Good morning #Canberra! New year, new job, new wake-up time. Join me on @abccanberra at 530 for the news.

Correction to earlier direct quote, Health Dept Sec said looking at "commercial possibilities" around the Medicare payment system #estimates
Health Dept Sec tells #estimates govt not looking at privatisation of Medicare, instead looking at "commercialisation of payments"
Health Dept Sec tells #estimates Medicare payments system up to 30 years out of date and needs to be revitalised for modern age
